sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; let VotingInstance = require('./Voting') let web3 = require('./Web3'); let project = {} let state = '' let etime = '' class voting_info extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ accounts: '', tickets:0 } this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this); this.up=this.up.bind(this); } handleChange(event){ const name=event.target.name; const value=event.target.value; this.setState({ [name]:value }) } componentWillMount = async () => { project = {} project = await VotingInstance.methods.all_Votings(this.props.match.params.id).call() project.target_voting = web3.utils.fromWei(project.target_voting, 'ether'); project.num_voted = web3.utils.fromWei(project.num_voted, 'ether') console.log(project) etime = project.endtime let current_time = Date.parse(new Date()) if(project.isComplete === true){ state = "Voting Finished" } else{ if(etime - current_time >= 0){ state = "Voting in Progress" } else{ state = "Project is overdue" } } etime = (new Date(parseInt(etime))).toLocaleDateString() let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts() this.setState({ accounts: accounts }) }; async up(){ if (this.state.tickets === 0){ alert('Amount must be more than 1') } else{ if(this.state.tickets > (project.target_voting - project.num_voted)){ alert('The Voting Requirement has been Satisfied!') } else{ await VotingInstance.methods.Vote_sender(this.props.match.params.id).send({ from: this.state.accounts[0], value: web3.utils.toWei(this.state.tickets,'ether') }) alert('Voting Success!') } } } render() { return (
    • Voting System
     {/**/} {/*
    */} {/*// */}
  • Home
  • All Voting
    • {/**/} {/*
    */}
  • Initiate Voting
  • Current Account Addressï¼š{this.state.accounts[0]}

Voting Initiator:{project.creator_addr}
Voting Name:{project.title}
Voting Status:{state}
Voting Target:{project.target_voting}
Number of tickets voted:{project.num_voted}
Voting End Time:
Voters:{project.voter_num}

{project.content}

Vote

Voting Number

); } } export default voting_info;
